reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing price for what you get!
reviews.reviewText: Love this camera. I wanted to get a decent camera for traveling this year instead of using my smart phone. The number of lenses and accessories you get for this price is an amazing deal. Nothing was broken or scratched when it arrived. Camera is pretty simple to use. If you are a beginner like me, I would recommend this camera bundle. I absolutely love the bag it came with. It fits all the lenses, camera, and accessories in it perfectly.

Simply amazing. I love this camera and the gear that it came with. I have been taking it everywhere I go and snapping off shots. With a little work in post you can easily make some nice looking stuff. It is my first DSLR and won't be going back to the days of point and shoot cameras or digital zoom.

For those taking the first steps into photography, I recommend watching youtube vids about setting up your settings and using manual mode. It easily has been the most useful setting on the camera.

I love my camera, and this bundle had so many extra goodies/lenses in it. love the fact that I get another battery, too.

About the camera, I wish the Rebel T6 had an option for an extension for a microphone :/ but hey for the price, it is amazing.

I wish I had a satchel bag for the camera, but the camera comes with the big bag for all the stuff. LOVE my camera, wanted one forever.

I wish there was a 6th star! This camera ðŸŽ¥ is what I've been looking for! First off, it's easy to use with hundreds of functions to help create the perfect photo! 2nd, its extremely lightweight and versatile. Finally the up to date wi-fi capability, remote Canon App and photo sharing make it a fast and fun photography experience!

I got this for a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Italy. The camera is easy to use and pretty intuitive. I got extra sim cards to make sure I wouldn't run out of space. The extra battery is great, just remember to keep the plastic end cover to use when you're traveling. I'm not a professional photographer, so all I can say is that all of the pictures turned out great, and I'm looking forward to taking it on my next trip.

I really like the camera lens and bag but i couldn't give a full five stars because the extra battery that came with the bundle would not hold a charge
I originally gave this a 3 but after talking to customer service I was told I could return the whole package and they would send a new one. I told them that I was leaving on vacation soon and could not wait for a new one. At that they offered a credit which I could use to buy a new battery. I ordered a new battery and everything works wonderful

reviews.reviewTitle: Wonderful set of lenses and camera for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I had to leave my expensive Canon EOS 7D Mark ll camera, 400mm lens, and myriads of smaller lenses in Thailand, when I had to leave suddenly due to severe illness (cancer). Once I became strong enough to carry a camera on my hikes in the desert near Albuquerque, I was glad to have this inexpensive, but WONDERFUL Canon camera.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera for beginner to dslr.
reviews.reviewText:
Nice features, still learning the menus and controls but so far loving this camera.
Comfortable and lightweight.

Perfect for beginners to the DSLR world.
Highly recommended this item.

Wanting to get into photography and start taking pictures of my kids. Overall so far so good. Great price for all that comes in it. I shopped around at both best buy and target, Amazon of course offered the package which no other place did. Love the WiFi capabilities and the fact that it connects directly to my galaxy s7 so picture sharing to instagram is so quick and easy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not all the accessories or lens fit the camera!
reviews.reviewText: The camera is awesome with some of the accessories but half of the accessories and lens aren't compatable with the canon t6. I was very bummed to see that the wide lens and the telephoto lens with the filters dont fit the camera. I bought it due to all the cool lens being added. Dont recommend this if you're looking forward to all the lens.

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived on time and as advertised with great product support
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time and as advertised. This is a nice outfit with all the extras we would usually require. We had a few issues which were handled promptly through Amazon. We are looking forward to a new experience in photography. We would most certainly deal with this company again.

I absolutely adore this camera and it takes fantastic pictures. Even with many of the default settings and manual zoom and focus, the pictures are outstanding. When I sent in pictures to be printed, I had to sign a copyright disclosure as the store wanted to make sure I wasn't ripping off professional photographers (I like to think it is because of my awesome skills, but I'm pretty sure it was because of the high quality of the images).

All the pieces in the package were included and none are of a low quality that are often found in packages like this. Do be aware that with all the lenses, camera, and pieces that this set is huge and heavy. I tried travelling with just one of the lenses to make it a little lighter and instantly regretted not having the versatility of the different lenses, so just be prepared to want to bring the whole pack with you!
Love this camera been real good to me I forgot I bought it on amazon too! Wonderful product and great beautiful pictures and videos!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great starter DSLR for use as a research camera
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this camera since January for taking photos of specimens as a part of my research. I'm a paleontologist-in-training and usually take photos inside museum collections; my subjects tend to be fossils and bones. This camera is easy to use, and the quality of the photos is plenty good for my purposes. I would highly recommend this model for other graduate students and/or early-career researchers.

I like the auto focus and all the lenses. The only thing I would do differently is not put in the liquid cleanser. Despite all effects the second kit arrived and the liquid was everywhere. What is happening is it get frozen and then expands. Then it leaks.. I dont want a replacement.. it's just a suggestion.
Love my Canon EOS Rebel T6 digital camera. The pictures come out so clear and crisp. Really that it has several settings. I also bought a zoom lens and tripod.
I was very pleased upon the arrival of my Canon Rebel T6 package. Every thing I need to take quality photos! It even showed up earlier than expected!

Bought this camera 4 months ago, mostly to have for the birth of our second daughter, so it hasn't been used much until now. Of course, when I go to use it the second battery was found to be flawed and doesn't work despite charging it for 10 hours the night before her birth. Because of this I missed pictures I'll never get back! Disappointed.

AMAZING value!! I absolutely LOVE this kit, and I would have never been able to afford it at retail price. This is a perfect starter camera for anyone who wants a boost in their photo quality! Absolutely beautiful!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great package at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with the Canon T6 package. It contains a lot for the price. It arrived quickly and was well packaged. I highly recommend the seller

reviews.reviewTitle: Great bundle, this is the way to go!
reviews.reviewText: Recently made the T6 bundle purchase and so happy I did. I have some upcoming vacation time and I look forward to using everything that came in the bundle. I upgraded from the T1i purchased over 5 years ago and didn't have any additional lenses, so I am looking forward to taking some amazing pictures with this camera!

I really needed to upgrade my DSLR camera and this looked like a good packaged deal but I'm holding back on high praises because of issues I had immediately with the 75-300 mm lens. First, the mount wherein the lens attaches to the T6 camera body is rough and stiff unlike any of my other Canon lenses. I tried my other Canon lenses as well as the included 18-55 mm lens and all mounted smoothly to T6 body. Secondly, the lens does not focus in Auto mode. It meters but does not focus so no picture. It works great in Manual mode but for times when I want to use the lens in Auto mode, no dice.

I will be contacting the seller directly to see if I can get a replacement for just the defective lens without having to return the entire package.

As for performance, the camera is lightweight, easier to use than my previous xTi, and just about fool proof if one has prior experience with DSLR cameras. I have not tried the movie mode yet and don't foresee a lot of use in that area but for folks into that sort of thing, I understand the sound is not the best so looking at the T6i may be a better option. The photos I've taken thus far have been of very good quality and the camera has performed well.
Excellent and amazing quality. Not to mention a great value.
Everything arrived on time! All accessories that were included were actually USABLE
Great starter kit. I reviewed several bundles before deciding on this one.
extra battery would not charge one phone call and a new battery arrived a few days later.

reviews.reviewTitle: This camera is a great package. It came with everything I needed and ...
reviews.reviewText: This camera is a great package. It came with everything I needed and for once it all fits in the provided bag. I am very happy with the ease of use and the quality of the product. I would recommend this to anyone. For the price it is totally worth the buy.

Everything came as described. Although, the accesories aren't he best. The SD card reader came apart the first time I used it. Do not risk damaging your SD card, buy a better quality one. The screen protectors are not good- air bubbles galore. The bag is nice, and the lenses work fine.
I received this and one of the batteries doesn't work. Notified them and heard nothing!

reviews.reviewTitle: It is a great camera, the pictures are amazing and it very ...
reviews.reviewText: It is a great camera, the pictures are amazing and it very easy to use. It gives so many different possibilities and the features are really easy to access. The self explanatory caption on the bottom of the screen is very helpful.

Excellent quality - great pictures and great price for what you receive
Easy to understand how to use. I haven't touched a 35mm in decades and the first digital one. Was taking photo's in minutes. Those photo's were of excellent quality looking professional.

reviews.reviewTitle: Got this as a Christmas gift. Came exactly as ...
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a Christmas gift. Came exactly as described. This is my first SLR...so my hubby got me the "book for dummies" too! As a first SLR user, I'm going to need it!
This product is exactly what I need except the carrying bag is not designed for this bundle.

Let me start by saying that I am, by no means, a professional. This camera, however, makes me feel like one! All of the different modes on the camera make taking pictures in any type of lighting a breeze, and all of the extras it comes with a just wonderful. The handheld/tabletop tripod is so much better than I thought it would be, and the bag is great, as well. I'm still getting the hang of the extra lens and add on bits, but I'm having a blast with it so far. And, don't even get me started on how AMAZING the built-in wifi is! Seriously great bundle!

reviews.reviewTitle: ... with all of its features will make taking photos easy and enjoyable
reviews.reviewText: The Canon Rebel T6 with all of its features will make taking photos easy and enjoyable!

reviews.reviewText: I have not owned a camera since Viet Nam and that one was a Cannon as well. This works well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great action shots for U14 hockey
reviews.reviewText: We have been looking for a midprice camera that can handle the fast pace of youth hockey. This one is the best we have owned to date. It takes rapid up close shots in dimly lit Wisconsin youth hockey rinks. If you are used to a contained zoom lense, there is a learning curve to using detachable lenses, but once you get the hang of it, the camera is excellent. We have paid double for other cameras that did not have nearly the shutter speed on this camera and did not get anywhere near as close shots.

I researched for a DSLR camera for awhile and I've decided on the Canon EOS Rebel T6 bundle. I FOUND IT BY Photo4Less through Amazon...highly recommended! The package came in two days and it was packaged perfectly. I just started playing with it a little bit and find it fairly easy to use. Instruction manual online was easy to access and download. The bundle made it easy to get started with the camera without having to purchase individual items. Great price for the bundle!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great pic. Makes a lot of noise
reviews.reviewText: Takes great pictures. It is very very load for a camera. Take a picture and it makes a clatter. Turn on the view screen makes a load clatter. You wont be doing any wild life shooting with this camera. Order extra battery's. You will need them. Really hard on battery's
I love it! It was a little smaller than I expected, but that is actually 100% a god thing! I think the size is perfect and so far I love the apps and everything.

This set is awesome!!! Th camera, the lenses, the flash cards!! The only gripe I have is the camera bag wasn't my style but I purchased a canon camera backpack to fit more items. The small tripod is pretty flimsy but I already have a larger tripod that I use. Overall it's definitely worth the price!!
great variety of accessories at good price

I love this bundle!
Its unique!

This is OK

Awesome camera. It takes a while to get use to all the controls, but the pictures are fantastic. It's the best camera I have had so far. I am just a beginner, but we have so much wildlife I wanted to take some great pictures of them all. I feel confident that the pictures will turn out great. Just read the manual, and get to know your camera.
